objects.text:
• 7.1 Surround Sound
• 50mm Drivers
• Memory Foam Cushion
• Superior Mic Clarity

product_details.name: Razer BlackShark V2 X Gaming Headset: 7.1 Surround Sound - 50mm Drivers - Memory Foam Cushion - For PC, PS4, PS5, Switch - 3.5mm Audio Jack - Black
product_details.description: Embrace the sound of esports with the Razer BlackShark V2 X-a triple threat of amazing audio, superior mic clarity and supreme sound isolation. With our best headset mic and audio drivers packed into a unique aviation-style headset, your competitive play is destined to turn pro.

banner_details:
The banner features a sleek, modern gaming-themed layout set against a dark angular background with diagonal overlays and subtle green gradient patterns. At the top-left, a bold white primary heading ("heading") is prominently displayed, followed underneath by a vibrant green subheading ("subheading") in a condensed bold font. Below these, a concise bulleted list ("description") details the product features in clean white text. The product image ("product_image") of a high-quality black gaming headset is placed on the right, angled dynamically for emphasis. Toward the bottom-left, the price ("price") is highlighted in bold green, accompanied by a rounded green call-to-action button ("cta_button") with white text ("cta").

**Color Palette:**
- Deep Black: `#121212`
- Dark Gray: `#1A1A1A`
- Vibrant Green: `#44A85B`
- Pure White: `#FFFFFF`
product_color: The product image features a sleek black gaming headset with subtle green accents, conveying a modern and high-performance design. The dominant matte black (#1A1A1A) covers most of the headset, delivering a premium and minimalist look while highlighting shapes and depth through soft shadows and textures. Bright green (#00FF33) is strategically used in the cable and mounting joints, adding energy and brand identity without overwhelming the composition. Subtle gray tones (#2E2E2E) support the matte finish and add dimension. The overall palette balances boldness and sophistication, making it ideal for a tech-themed banner with a futuristic or performance-oriented aesthetic.
